event.title: became a municipality in the year 1891

data.event: There is no exact data about the founding of the city, although there is an official date when the city became a municipality in the year 1891, the same year that Pichilemu did.
The city of Santa Cruz was among those affected by the 2010 Chile earthquake.

event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Santa Cruz spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Santa Cruz spans an area of 419.5 km2 (162 sq mi) and has 32,387 inhabitants (16,160 men and 16,227 women).
The population grew by 10.7% (3,129 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.
